commit.message:
Fixing compilation problems on rovere.tirasa.net and upgrading to latest Tomcat

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1247216 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -220,8 +220,7 @@
                         <phase>pre-integration-test</phase>
                         <configuration>
                             <target>
-                                <get src="http://www.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-7/v${tomcat.version}/bin/apache-tomcat-${tomcat.version}.zip"
-                                     dest="${java.io.tmpdir}" skipexisting="true"/>
+                                <get src="http://archive.apache.org/dist/tomcat/tomcat-7/v${tomcat.version}/bin/apache-tomcat-${tomcat.version}.zip" dest="${java.io.tmpdir}" skipexisting="true" />
                                 <unzip src="${java.io.tmpdir}/apache-tomcat-${tomcat.version}.zip"
                                        dest="${java.io.tmpdir}" overwrite="false"/>
                             </target>
